headline: Iron Mountain Commences Project Work for US Department of Treasury
summary: IRM starts the $140M Treasury digitization project and eyes a five-year federal contract with a broader scope and integration.

raw.headline: Iron Mountain Commences Project Work for US Department of Treasury
raw.summary: IRM starts the $140M Treasury digitization project and eyes a five-year federal contract with a broader scope and integration.

headline: Iron Mountain ‘welcomes’ opportunity to compete for larger Treasury contract
summary: Iron Mountain (IRM) provided the following update on its recently awarded contract by the U.S. Department of the Treasury. “The company has commenced work under the award and is actively digitizing documents and leveraging its proprietary intelligent digitization solution as part of the engagement. Earlier this week the U.S. Department of the Treasury issued a Request for Quotations for a new long-term engagement for digitalization as a service, with an expanded scope and a lengthened contract p

summary: On June 18, 2025, Iron Mountain Incorporated, Iron Mountain Information Management, LLC, and certain other subsidiaries of the Company entered into an Amendment No. 6 to the Company?s Credit...
